DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, three-arm, double-blind, placebo-controlled, Phase III clinical trial of caffeinated gum and sugar-less gum in adult patients after an abdominal procedure. Patients will be randomized to receive placebo, sugar-less gum or caffeinated gum three times daily for 30 minutes starting the day following surgery until discharge or 24 hours after attainment of the primary endpoint.
DOC.brief_title: Caffeinated Gum to Prevent Post-Operative Ileus: A Prospective, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Abdominal procedure (Laparoscopic or open, occurring electively), American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status score ≤ 3, Glasgow Coma Score (GCS) ≥ 15.
